div.li: PER THE GOVERNOR, SCHOOLS WILL REMAIN CLOSED THROUGH THE END OF THIS SCHOOL YEAR

a.u: Peabody Public Schools Closure Resources & Guidance Website

br.p: Dear Incoming Kindergarten Parents, Please drop off the completed registration packet (linked below) with required approved documents at the Administration building (mailbox slot - no contact drop...
Open Enrollment Applications for the 2020-2021 school year will be available on June 1, 2020. You can obtain an application on this site beginning June 1, 2020 or by...
Click 'Read more' for important information regarding the upcoming school committee meeting...

div.h3: Special Education Remote Instruction Requirements & FAQ

Please click Read More for a comprehensive list of Social & Emotional Support Resources.

p.strong: Per the Governor, All Schools Will Remain Closed Until May 4, 2020
All Peabody Public Schools buildings have been cleaned and are therefore closed for all staff access with the exception of cafeterias for food pickup.
